name: Çatalhöyük VR
description:
Çatalhöyük VR is an immersive Virtual Reality experience that transports you and your friend to the impressive Çatalhöyük, a neolithic settlement. Located in modern day Turkey, in an isolated region near Konya, it is still an active excavation that has been characterized as a UNESCO Heritage site.

Together with your friend, you embark on a journey where you explore the site together and experience in amazing photorealistic graphics the reconstructed past and the present of the site.

At the same time, you engage in activities that will bring you closer to those who lived in Çatalhöyük approximately 9000 years ago.
